text: 28|76|Niscaya kbarauna achila muchara sampradayabhukta, kintu si sihamtara prati aud'dhatya prakasa karaichila. Arau ami taka dana karaichilo imana dhana-bhandara ye, yara cabibora bahana karaa edala saktisali manuhara pakse'o kastasadhya achila.
